mapper.select: SELECT ticket_purchase.purchase_date, customer_info.customer_gender, SUM(ticket_class_info.ticket_price) TICKETSUM, SUM(facility_sales.customer_sales) FACILITYSUM, SUM(ticket_class_info.ticket_price + facility_sales.customer_sales) TOTALSUM FROM CUSTOMER_INFO JOIN TICKET_purchase ON (customer_info.customer_id = ticket_purchase.customer_id) JOIN TICKET_CLASS_INFO ON (ticket_purchase.ticket_class_code = ticket_class_info.ticket_class_code) JOIN facility_sales ON (ticket_purchase.ticket_pub_code = facility_sales.ticket_pub_code) JOIN facility_info ON (facility_sales.facility_code = facility_info.faclility_code) WHERE PURCHASE_DATE = #{PURCHASE_DATE} GROUP BY customer_info.customer_gender, ticket_purchase.purchase_date
